product_name: The North Face Sanctuary Pants - Women's
long_description: Don't let the cold weather outside the yoga studio throw you off balance. Slip on the stretchy, wind-resistant Sanctuary pants from The North Face to maintain that after-practice glow. You won't feel the wind against your skin, but you will feel the soft warmth of a lightweight woven fabric. Drawcord waist seals in warmth. The North Face Sanctuary pants feature hand pockets.
short_description: Don't let the cold weather outside the yoga studio throw you off balance. Slip on the stretchy, wind-resistant Sanctuary pants from The North Face to maintain that after-practice glow.
